review: I went to this doctor with heavy back ache. He was not hurrying up unlike other docs, was very patient in listening fully to me, explained me my problem with the help of few pictures and prescribed me medicines. Even though I was in a position to go for any tests due to my pain, he advised that he will prescribe for xrays only if the pain does not come down in a week. I felt he is quite different from others in that sense too... were I usually end up in doing multiple tests even for simple ailments.

I am very much thankful Dr. Prashanth who helped for my son's knee surgery were I was very much disappointed in his matter but he helped to handle the situation very much patiently

Thank you Dr.

He  is good in explaining the terms of pain and how to get rid of pain..
He gives clear explanation regarding the problem . i felt happy to know the things in detailed manner
A really great experience and nice doctor. I would recommend him to anyone who needs him. My son went in with a broken leg and a week later we went in again and came out with a recovered foot.
He saw us before appointed time. He was very attentive and understood health condition very quickly.
My 2 year old son sprained his elbow while playing. He walked crying and walked out smiling. Wait time and consultation time was very less.
